hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #3# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Hylian Shield#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of time.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Deku Shield#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Light Arrows#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Game Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Right Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #the Minuet of Forest#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Ice Arrows Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that you can reach the invisible Hookshot target before the fans room in Shadow Temple with just the Hookshot if you backflip onto the chest?

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path of time.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Lullaby Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of time.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Upper Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Side Room Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Light Arrows#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Deku Shield# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Hylian Shield#.
